title: GMG Careers
text:
We proudly offer robust benefits for our full-time employees Paid Medical Insurance 
We cover 100% of the premiums for standard medical insurance plans. This includes coverage for domestic partners, spouses, and families. We also cover life, short, and long-term disability insurance. Time off When Needed 
Take off time when you need, in consultation with your manager. 401 (k) Contribution 
After one year of employment, we'll contribute 3% of your entire compensation, on top of any contributions you make to your 401 (k) plan. New NYC/Budapest Offices 
We have a brand-new, NYC office in Union Square, with weekly catered meals . We also have a new office for our team in Budapest ! WEEKLY CATERED MEALS FUN PEOPLE Stay Healthy 
We subsidize a significant portion of Equinox or New York Sports Club memberships. Not a member? Weâ€™ll reimburse you up to $50/month for a gym or yoga studio of your choice Phone Bill Reimbursement 
We reimburse every employee for their cell phone plan, up to $80 per month. Commuter Benefits 
Have money deducted directly from your paycheck on a pre-tax basis, which you can use for public transit and parking costs. Referral Bonus 
Many of our best employees come from referrals. Refer a friend to an open position and get $1,500 after 90 days. Current U.S. Job Openings
